rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, how splendid.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0002
rows.name:
Will you take a look at that view!
That's quite some natural beauty,
right there.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0003
rows.name:
Yeah, I can't imagine seeing a view
quite like this anywhere else.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0004
rows.name:
Yeah, you don't see a view like this
every day, that's for sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0005
rows.name:
I quite agree. A view this beautiful
is a rare and remarkable sight.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0006
rows.name:
Yep, it's a rare sight all right. You don't
see a view like this just anywhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm a little surprised you appreciate
this kind of beauty though, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0008
rows.name:
I thought you liked things
a little more...flashy.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0009
rows.name:
Ohoho... You're sharp, Kagutsuchi, hon,
but not sharp enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0010
rows.name:
Sure, I'm a big fan of extravagant
beauty, but there's somethin' extra
special about the beauty o' nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0012
rows.name: The beauty of nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0013
rows.name:
You mean, things are more beautiful
in their natural state?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0014
rows.name:
Pretty much. If you can be beautiful
without even tryin'...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0015
rows.name: Ain't that just the purest beauty of all?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0016
rows.name: Hmm... Is that right?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0025
rows.name:
I mean, look at Hana. Does she put
any effort into how she looks? Naw.
But she's still a total sweetheart.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0026
rows.name: I suppose that's true.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0027
rows.name:
There's any number o' ways to
spruce yourself up an' make
yourself look beautiful.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0028
rows.name:
But that's just smoke an' mirrors.
Making the surface look good while
ignoring what's underneath.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0030
rows.name:
So I figure real beauty is the stuff that
happens naturally, without any o' that.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0036
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0037
rows.name: Either way, you're pretty beautiful.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0038
rows.name: Why is nature so important to you?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0039
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0040
rows.name: You're pretty beautiful anyway, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0041
rows.name: Why're you so keen on nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0042
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0043
rows.name: You seem quite beautiful, in any case.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0044
rows.name: Why are you so concerned with nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0045
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0046
rows.name: Either way, you're a stunner.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0047
rows.name: Why're you so crazy about nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0101
rows.name:
Why, thank you, hon!
But I've still got a long way to go.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0102
rows.name:
Like I said before, it's not enough to
just look good on the outside.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0103
rows.name:
Like, say if I was to scarf down
all your breakfasts by myself,
would you think I was beautiful then?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0104
rows.name:
Or if I ran away in the middle of battle,
leavin' my Driver behind.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0105
rows.name:
To be really beautiful, you've gotta
start from what's inside.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0106
rows.name:
The beauty that flows forth naturally
from a person, both inside and out...
That's what I'm strivin' for.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0107
rows.name:
That's why my goal is to never
hide behind decorations an'
always show my true self.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0108
rows.name:
Oh, that makes sense. That's a
pretty cool philosophy to live by.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0109
rows.name:
Oh, I get it. Pretty neat philosophy
to live by, I guess.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0110
rows.name:
Interesting. I feel this philosophy
captures your essence quite well.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0111
rows.name:
Oh right, I get it. Yeah, that's not
a bad philosophy to live by.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0112
rows.name:
Then maybe you'd like to join me, hon?
We can better our true selves together!

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0201
rows.name:
Keen on nature, huh?
I never really thought about it,
but I guess you could say I am.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0202
rows.name:
I mean, you humans age as the
years go by, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0203
rows.name:
Gals especially tend to really hate that,
feelin' like it's just makin' them uglier,
but me, I think it's a beautiful thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0204
rows.name:
An aging body's a sign of the long life
you've lived, and a mark of all the
experiences you've been through, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0205
rows.name:
So I figure that's a unique form
o' natural beauty, too.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0206
rows.name:
So it's like...a human life itself is a
work of art created by nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0207
rows.name: That's a pretty cool philosophy.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0208
rows.name:
So what, each human life is another
one of nature's works of art?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0209
rows.name: Pretty neat way of looking at it.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0210
rows.name:
So each human life is a work of art
created by the bounty of nature?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0211
rows.name: That's an admirable way of putting it.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0212
rows.name:
Oh, I get it. So like, each human life
is one of nature's works of art?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0213
rows.name: Pretty classy way of looking at it.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0214
rows.name:
Bein' a Blade, I wasn't born from
nature like you humans are.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0215
rows.name:
I came into the world lookin' this way,
and when my Driver dies, I'll disappear
lookin' just the same.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0216
rows.name:
Us Blades never change, and we
fade away all too suddenly.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0217
rows.name:
I guess that's why I kind of admire
the natural, fleeting beauty you humans
have.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0218
rows.name:
I'm glad you're my Driver, hon.
I can already imagine how gracefully
you'll age over the years.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0219
rows.name: I almost can't wait to see it! Hahaha.
